HERO.DESCRIPTION: I design and develop innovative web solutions that transform your ideas into exceptional digital experiences. Currently looking for a full-time position.

JOB_SEARCH.TITLE: Looking for a Full-Time Position
JOB_SEARCH.SUBTITLE: I am actively looking for a full-time position in web development. Mobile throughout France, I am ready to fully commit to your team.
JOB_SEARCH.GOAL_DESC: Join a development team full-time to put my skills at the service of ambitious projects and contribute sustainably to the company's growth.
JOB_SEARCH.MOBILITY_DESC: Fully mobile throughout France. Ready to relocate for the right opportunity and to adapt to the company's geographic constraints.
JOB_SEARCH.AVAILABILITY_DESC: Available immediately for a full-time position. Flexible on conditions depending on the company's needs.
JOB_SEARCH.MOTIVATION_DESC: Passionate, curious and motivated, I bring a fresh perspective, a great learning capacity and the desire to actively contribute to the team's success.
JOB_SEARCH.CTA_TEXT: Is your company looking for a motivated developer? Let's discuss this opportunity!

ABOUT.TITLE: About
ABOUT.PARA1: Passionate fullstack developer, I create remarkable web experiences by combining creativity and technical expertise. My approach combines innovation and quality to bring your digital projects to life.
ABOUT.PARA2: Currently looking for a full-time position, I wish to join a dynamic team to fully contribute to ambitious projects by bringing my skills and technical expertise.
ABOUT.PARA3: Autonomous, rigorous and always on the lookout for the latest innovations, I enjoy tackling complex technical challenges. My mobility throughout France allows me to seize the best training and professional development opportunities.

SERVICES.TITLE: Services
SERVICES.INTRO1: I put your success at the heart of every project. My collaborative approach ensures that your needs are perfectly understood and delivered.
SERVICES.INTRO2: Looking for a full-time position, I bring solid technical expertise, great motivation and the desire to be durably involved in your projects.
SERVICES.INTRO3: My geographic mobility allows me to perfectly adapt to your company's needs, wherever it is located in France.
